00034 class fock {
00035     private:
00036 
00037         pair <const mol_and_orb *, const mol_and_orb *> molecules; // an ordered pair of pointers to the molecules
00038         vector <double> Beta ;
00039         vector <double> Mu; // the choice of paramters
00040 
00041         double **F; 
00042 
00043         void calc_F_el_with_HASH( const double & , double & , const double & , const double & , const double & , const double & , 
00044                 const int & , const int & , const int & , const int &  ) const;
00045         void calc_F_lean( ) const ;
00046 
00047         static bool _init_HASH;
00048 
00049     public:
00050 
00052         
00053         fock ():  F(NULL)  {
00054                 //F = NULL;
00055                 molecules.first = NULL;
00056                 molecules.second = NULL;
00057                 
00058         }
00059 
00060         fock (  const mol_and_orb & A, const mol_and_orb & B ): F(NULL){
00061                 
00062                 molecules.first  = &A;
00063                 molecules.second = &B;
00064                 int n1, n2;
00065 
00066                 n1 = molecules.first  -> getNBasis();
00067                 n2 = molecules.second -> getNBasis();
00068 
00069                 F = new double* [n1];
00070                 F[0] = new double [n1*n2];
00071                 for (int i = 1 ; i < n1 ; ++i){
00072                     F[i] = F[i-1] +  n2;
00073                 }
00074                 
00075                 if ( _init_HASH == false ) {
00076                     fock::init_HASH();
00077                     _init_HASH = true;
00078                 }
00079         }
00080 
00081         void init(  const mol_and_orb & A, const mol_and_orb & B ){
00082                 molecules.first  = &A;
00083                 molecules.second = &B;
00084                 int n1, n2;
00085 
00086                 n1 = molecules.first  -> getNBasis();
00087                 n2 = molecules.second -> getNBasis();
00088 
00089                 F = new double* [n1];
00090                 F[0] = new double [n1*n2];
00091                 for (int i = 1 ; i < n1 ; ++i){
00092                     F[i] = F[i-1] +  n2;
00093                 }
00094                 
00095                 if ( _init_HASH == false ) {
00096                     fock::init_HASH();
00097                     _init_HASH = true;
00098                 }
00099                 
00100                 SetParameters();
00101                 CheckParameters(A);
00102                 CheckParameters(B);
00103         }
00104         
00105         ~fock() {
00106             
00107         #ifdef DEBUG
00108         cout << "callgin the fockk classdestructor" << endl;
00109         #endif
00110             clear();
00111         }
00112 
00113         void clear () {
00114             if ( F != NULL ) {
00115                 delete [] F[0];
00116                 delete [] F;
00117                 F = NULL;
00118             }
00119             Beta.clear();
00120             Mu.clear();
00121         }
00122 
00123 //void set_zindo_1();
00124 //void set_zindo_s();
00125         void SetParameters();
00126         void CheckParameters(const mol_and_orb & );
00127 
00128         vector <double> calcJ( vector<pair <unsigned int, unsigned int> >) const;
00129         double calcJ( pair <int, int>) const;
00130         
00131         int init_HASH();
00132 
00133 };
